import './Navbar.css' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import { FaShoppingCart } from "react-icons/fa" import { FaDollarSign } from "react-icons/fa" import { FaShoppingBag } from 'react-icons/fa' import About from '../../pages/About/About' function Navbar() { const classToggle = () => { const navs = document.querySelectorAll('Navbar-Items') navs.forEach(nav => nav.classList.toggle('Navbar-ToogleShow')); document.querySelector('Navbar-link-toggle') .addEventListener('click', classToggle) } return (
Home
) } export default Navbar
